titleStmt.title: Eleven sermons preached upon several occasions and a paraphrase and notes upon the first, second, third, fourth, fifth, seventh and eighth chapters of St. John : with a discourse of church-unity ... / by William Clagett.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: "Paraphrase and notes ... " and "Discourse of church unity ... " lacking.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
